0.1.name: wordpress/pricetable
0.1.description:
This plugin gives you a drag and drop interface for building price tables. It also renders those price tables using pure CSS3. They have a clean, minimal design - so they'll fit into just about any design (thanks Orman)

Read our release post to find out more about this plugin.

I'm offering free support as I build this plugin up to version 1.0. Just hop on our support forum - no signup required.
